articles.title: Telegraph Media Group set to be put up for sale - BBC
articles.description: Lloyds is looking to recover debts owed by the network of companies controlled by the Barclay family.
articles.content:
The Daily and Sunday Telegraph newspapers and The Spectator magazine are set to be put up for sale due to debts owed by their parent group.
Receivers Alix Partners have now taken control of the grou… [+2813 chars]

articles.title: Heritable transcriptional defects from aberrations of nuclear architecture - Nature.com
articles.description: Micronuclei, which are common features of nuclei in cancer cells, can generate heritable sources of transcriptional suppression, a finding that establishes an inherent relationship between chromosomal instability and variation in chromatin state and gene expr…
